Fri, 02 Feb 2024 08:06:18 +0000 Four men have been rescued after their boat hit a log and sank within a few hundred metres of the Port of Napier this afternoon.

Thu, 01 Feb 2024 23:00:00 +0000 An artist’s impression of the Kāinga Ora development proposed for Tiki Pl, Tamingi St and Peter Snell Rd in Ruakākā shows two-storey homes with high density. The several houses in the very middle of the development are existing, privately owned homes. Photo / supplied.
